result.html: ar sheol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?
result.ponchtml: ar ẛeol tú an litirHave you sent the letter?

result.eng: The secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ga: bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.orig: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.html: bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreachaThe secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an rúnaí gnóṫaċ ag scríoḃ litreaċaThe secretary was busy writing letters.

result.eng: Letters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ga: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.orig: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist
result.html: bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ponchtml: bíonn moill ar litreaċa gan cód poistLetters without a postcode tend to be delayed.

result.eng: Put the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ga: cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.orig: Cuir an litir sa phost le do thoil
result.html: cuir an litir sa phost le do thoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.
result.ponchtml: cuir an litir sa ṗost le do ṫoilPut the letter in the post please. Post the letter please.

result.eng: This is proof that I have sent the letter.
result.ga: is cruthúnas é seo go bhfuil an litir seolta agam

result.ponchtml: maidir le do litirRegarding your letter...

result.ga: ní scríobhaim litreacha go minic
result.html: ní scríobhaim litreacha go minicI don't write letters often.

result.eng: I am still waiting for the letter.
result.ga: tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litir

result.html: tá mé fós ag fanacht leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.
result.ponchtml: tá mé fós ag fanaċt leis an litirI am still waiting for the letter.

result.eng: There are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ga: bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann

result.eng: He left a letter for me at the reception desk.
